hotels.title: French Alps Elegance Near Mont Blanc with Two Restaurants & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Nestled in the most exclusive corner of the French Alps, L'Alpaga, Megève, a Beaumier Hotel is your next ultra-stylish mountain hideaway. Think gorgeous wooden chalets that exude traditional Alpine charm. Collapse into sumptuous rooms with Mont Blanc views, soak your ski-weary muscles in the heavenly spa, or treat your taste buds to Michelin-worthy cuisine. Just a stone's throw from Megève's glitzy centre, this hotel puts you right where the action is. Hit the perfectly groomed slopes by day, then strut your stuff through designer boutiques and après-ski hotspots come evening. Fancy summer adventures? The backdoor leads straight to hiking trails and championship golf courses.
